description: If you want to take your iPod or iPhone with you during all aspects of your active lifestyle, then BudFits are for you. BudFits will ensure your iPod & iPhone earbuds won't fall out during even the most demanding physical activities while maximizing your comfort by eliminating the need to wedge the earbuds in your ear canals. Let your music rock you through extreme sports and intense workouts.
title: BudFits for iPod and iPhone earbuds (Frosted Clear) - not compatible with new Apple EarPods
